title: Is this Hunter for Real - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Famous Protagonist   Gods   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Revenge   Special Abilities   Strategic Battles   Unique Weapon User   Weak to Strong
author: Farnar   파르나르
description:
Choi Kahng-Sik was an ordinary Cameraman, but fate chooses him to become extraordinary!

Trying to survive in the world overrun by powerful monsters, he aims to become number one Monster Streamer so he could one day get his revenge on the monster that killed his entire family!

Along the way, he will receive aid- or hindrance – from the fickle Gods.

Let the unlikely globe-hopping adventure commence!>
